info.name: Steven Universe Space Background Tumblr Dash
info.description: This tumblr dash features a repeating image of an edited Steven Universe background compatible with any resolution or screen size, a pink gradient content box that disappears as you scroll, three different tumblr logos to choose from, optional home buttons, and will soon feature SU related post icons as well. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
info.additionalInfo: Goes great with my SU Space Tumblr IM 2/1 - Improved visibility for various buttons and other small code tweaks. 2/6 - Added post icons! 3/17 - Got rid of blue button colors 4/14 - Code updates & blue removal 6/19 - Force fix options for tumblr's new width. 12/19 - Content box tweaking. 1/5 - (Finally) logo resized & aligned properly. 1/31 - Some blue removal.

options.label: Wolf in the City Font Logo
